attributes.action: Help Maria del Rocio Garcia Rodriguez, have british residency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Maria del Rocio Garcia Rodriguez married in 1997 and moved to the Isle of Wight in 1998. She has two lovely children that were born in the UK. She asked her husband in 2007 for a divorce after suffering domestic abuse. Since then Rocio has worked for the minium wage and has never claimed any benefits of any kind. She pays her mortgage and council tax and everything else that needs to be paid. 
Rocio applied for permanant residence in the UK under EU rules, which state she must have five continous years of being a solvent citizen. She has complied with all this but has been refused permant residence. Please sign the petition to show your support for this wonderful lady and her children to remain in this country as a permanant resident.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
